meanings.definition: A tropical American tree bearing a sweet edible fruit.
meanings.sent1: The anan tree in the garden provides delicious fruits.
meanings.sent2: I picked a ripe anan from the tree for a snack.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys in the jungle love to feast on anan fruits.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as the anan fruit.
meanings.sent5: The anan fruit was so juicy, it dripped down my chin.

meanings.definition: A sweet edible fruit produced by the anan tree.
meanings.sent1: The anan was so ripe and juicy, it was a delight to eat.
meanings.sent2: She sliced the anan into perfect little pieces for the salad.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they played catch with the anan fruit.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the anan filled the room, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: The anan fruit was the highlight of the picnic, everyone wanted a taste.
